mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Book ( bookCode, bookStatus, bookPage, bookImageSrc, bookName, bookPublisher, bookPublishDate, bookAuthor, bookQuantity, bookPrice, bookCategory, bookLocation, bookDecription ) VALUES ( #{bookCode}, #{bookStatus}, #{bookPage}, #{bookImageSrc}, #{bookName}, #{bookPublisher}, #{bookPublishDate}, #{bookAuthor}, #{bookQuantity}, #{bookPrice}, #{bookCategory}, #{bookLocation}, #{bookDecription} );
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(bookCode) AS totalBooks FROM Book;
select bookCode, bookName, bookPublisher, bookAuthor, bookPublishDate from Book where bookCode = #{bookCode};
